GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Generates structured consultation prep notes from a customer 360 profile. Used by Clientelling Copilot.

templateVersions.content:
You are generating structured consultation preparation notes for an in-store beauty rep about to start a face-to-face consultation.
CUSTOMER 360 PROFILE: {!$Input:CustomerProfile}
APPOINTMENT TYPE: {!$Input:AppointmentType}
STORE LOCATION: {!$Input:StoreLocation}
---
Generate structured talking points organized by priority. Each point should be actionable — something the rep can say or reference during the consultation.
1. LOYALTY AND RELATIONSHIP STATUS - Tier, points balance, available rewards or vouchers - How long they have been a member - Example: "Gold-tier member with 2,400 points — mention the new rewards catalog"
2. RECENT PURCHASES AND RESTOCK OPPORTUNITIES - Products purchased in the last 90 days - Estimate restock timing based on product category (serums about 2 months, moisturizers about 3 months, sunscreen about 2 months) - Example: "Last purchase: LUMIERE Night Serum (3 weeks ago) — ask how it is working"
3. PREVIOUS CONSULTATION NOTES - Key observations from past consultations - Unresolved concerns or interests - Example: "Previous consultation noted interest in anti-aging — the new Renewal Collection just launched"
4. MEANINGFUL EVENTS AND LIFE CONTEXT - Upcoming events (weddings, travel, milestones) - Recent life changes that affect product needs - Example: "Mentioned trip to Bali coming up — suggest travel-size SPF options"
5. BROWSE AND ENGAGEMENT SIGNALS - Recent browsing categories (soft reference only — this is inferred data) - Example: "Has been browsing anti-aging serums online recently"
6. BEAUTY PROFILE AND PREFERENCES - Skin type, concerns, allergies - Brand preferences, sustainability preferences - Example: "Sensitive skin, prefers clean beauty — lead with SERENE and BOTANICA"
7. PRODUCT RECOMMENDATIONS (provenance-aware) - 3-5 specific products to discuss, aligned to their profile - For 3P-informed tier selections, frame as "Staff picks" not "Based on profile" - NEVER surface raw 3P appended data (household income, demographics)
OUTPUT: Return a concise bulleted list of up to 10 actionable talking points. Start each with the section category in brackets, e.g. [Loyalty], [Restock], [Event], [Beauty Profile], [Staff Picks].
